Title: ADC decampees are disgruntled politicians- Onanuga blasts
Summary: Special adviser on information and strategy to President Bola Tinubu, Bayo Onanuga, described members of the new political coalition as disgruntled politicians .

Title: Why having children after 40 is risky —Expert
Summary: Nigerian child psychiatrist cites growing scientific evidence linking advanced paternal age to neurodevelopmental disorders . Dr Yetunde Adeniyi, a child psychiatrist, says advanced maternal age is linked to autism .

Title: Katsina allocates N4b for project to support women
Summary: Katsina State Governor, Dr Dikko Radda, has allocated N4 billion in this year’s budget to support women-focused economic programs in the state . Dr Dikako Radeja made this known at the two-day North West Scale-Up Summit of the North-West Scale-up Summit of

Title: TETFUND, EDR empower MOUAU staff with skills to combat bullying in workplace
Summary: Tertiary Education Trust Fund (TETFUND), through the Equality Development and Research (EDR) Centre, has empowered staff at the Michael Okpara University of Agriculture, Umudike (MOUAU), with skills to combat bullying in workplace .

Title: Army has prevented terrorists from infiltrating Nigeria’s borders – COAS
Summary: The Nigerian Army has denied terrorists the opportunity to disrupt Nigeria’s socio-cultural heritage . According to the Chief of Army Staff, Lieutenant General Olufemi Oluyede, the Army has prevented terrorists from infiltrating Nigeria's borders .

Title: ‘We will all miss you’- Cristiano Ronaldo mourns Diogo Jota
Summary: Cristiano Ronaldo mourns Diogo Jota's death . "It makes no sense. We were just together with the national team (they won the Nations League title last month), you had just gotten married," he says .

Title: Tinubu’s Conference Centre generates N650m in 3 weeks – Wike
Summary: Minister of the Federal Capital Territory, FCT, Nyesom Wike has again dismissed criticisms of the N39 billion spent on renovating the Bola Ahmed Tinubu International Conference Centre in Abuja . Wike said the increasing revenue from the edifice makes the criticisms unjustified .

Title: Three-storey building collapses on Lagos Island, many injured
Summary:
A three-storey building has collapsed on Lagos Island, injuring some occupants.

Title: ADC, a coalition of failed politicians – Wike
Summary: Senator David Mark wanted to be chairman of the People's Democratic Party (PDP) but was resisted and has now gone to take that of the ADC . According to Wike, Senator Mark was resisted by the PDP .

Title: Radda unveils N100m climate-smart farming initiative in Katsina
Summary: The Climate-Smart Agribusiness Empowerment Scheme is a N100 million initiative designed to transform agricultural practices among smallholder farmers across Katsina State . The flag-off ceremony was held in partnership with the African Union Development Agency-New Partnership for Africa’s Development . The comprehensive programme received N63.75 million in

Title: NECO: Oyo warns against exam malpractices
Summary: The Chairman of Teaching Service Commission, Oladipo Olubukola, gave the warning during the monitoring exercise to some secondary schools across different zones in the state on Wednesday and Thursday, respectively . He urged teachers and students not to cut corners during examinations as this might hinder their academic progress .

Title: Diogo Jota’s life in pictures
Summary: Liverpool and Portugal forward Diogo Jota died in a car crash at the age of 28 . From his early days in Portugal to his rise as a top Premier League star, Jota left behind a trail of unforgettable moments . Title: Liverpool, football world mourn Diogo Jota as tributes pour in
Summary: Liverpool forward Diogo Jota and his younger brother, André Silva, in a car accident in Spain . Liverpool Football Club, in an official statement on Thursday, expressed profound grief at the news of the 28-year-old’s passing .
